results.content: Fast, to the point and a good overview of the basics of Canvas with some more advanced features as well.
results.content_html: Fast, to the point and a good overview of the basics of Canvas with some more advanced features as well.

results.content:
The material being taught here should be worth 3 or 4 stars as other Unity courses barely touch on the UI system. This one doesn't cover design/aesthetics but instead focuses on how to actually use the various UI components.

Unfortunately there is a long standing problem with the course files - one missing file causes a problem right at the start, and for most of the sections they provide a "starting" scene to work from which they have accidentally saved with everything completed, so you have to delete various scripts and gameobjects before you can follow each section. While this isn't rocket science it shouldn't be necessary and people have been querying this for months.

My other issue was with how much they sped up the video for the second half of the course; technically you can slow it down but then the audio sounds like you're having a bad trip, so the alternative is constantly tapping away at the space bar. All these courses depend on the fact that you can pause at any time, but none of the others I've done have pushed into "blink and you'll miss it" territory like this one.

The course is definitely worth doing because of what it covers, but sadly the irritations above make it more of a slog than the content deserves.

results.content:
There is nothing good about this course i would say only one thing that this instructor need to improve himself not just more but badly please do some work on how to make UI. Because,
1.When i make the whole UI and used that into my game it stopped working i don't know why but it is.
2. The ui done its all animation transition only once but when i paused my game and come to main screen nothing happens.
3. If you want to learn how to make UI just don't buy this course just see youtube videos and learn youtubers are better than this man.
4. The course heading says powerful UI learning , there is nothing like that you only let yourself down.
5. I made UI by using the knowledge from this videos but it is useless then i go to youtube and learn ui and my ui worked perfectly.
6. When i took this course i was so much excited about learning UI but this course kicked on my a** and i can't improve my ui knowledge through this course so it's useless.
7. Instructor speed is so fast and no proper explanation why he did that particular thing.
8. His zip file also not working properly. Unity shows script error after importing this zip to project.

so, in all taking this course is just waste of time and money.

results.content: Very good explanation from the instructor at a speedy pace!
results.content_html: Very good explanation from the instructor at a speedy pace!

results.content: The courseware is not maintained. Support is poor, all I get is a "we'll get back to you"... If the course is not supported then it should be free, or removed. Packt publish books, there's a difference between pushing out content, and education. I would avoid this course.

results.content: Provided resources aren't working as advertised. The instructor mentions an intro video that doesn't exist.  Provided Unity scene and scripts are already completed. Not a good start, to say the least.
